message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DB. 

The paper deals with product search, which is a subfield of information retrieval (cs.IR). The proposed method involves querying users on the expected presence of entities in the relevant product documents, which can be seen as a natural language processing (NLP) task (cs.CL). The method also involves learning from user search history and purchase behavior, which can be seen as a machine learning (ML) task (cs.LG, cs.AI). Finally, the method involves working with product documents, which can be seen as a database (DB) task (cs.DB).
